info.title: Cpnucleo Web API
info.description: A sample project that implements best practices when building modern .NET projects

patch.description: Updates the workflow identified by the provided Id with new given data. Validates existence and returns whether the update was successful.

delete.description: Deletes the workflows specified by the provided Ids. Validates existence of each, removes them, updates the repository, and commits the transaction.

get.summary: Retrieve an workflow by Id
get.description: Fetches the workflow matching the provided Id. Returns 404 if not found, otherwise returns the workflow data mapped to a DTO.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the workflow.

post.description: Creates a new workflow record with the given data and custom Id. Validates uniqueness and returns the created workflow's data.

get.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of workflows
get.description: Fetches workflows based on pagination parameters, maps entities to DTOs, and returns paginated results with metadata (total count, page number, and page size).

parameters.name: pagination
parameters.description: Gets or sets the pagination parameters for the request.
